Text:
hey bro will you be posting fantasia 2000??

thx bro my sis would appreciate it =)

I hope this one works on my WDTV. Mad Max doesn't as well as a few others. The problem is with header compression (it comes as default in the new update of the software that converts to mkv). I will let you know. If it doesn't please stop using header compression when you create mkv files. Thanks.
Nobody's gonna listen to you, nargyriadis. The people who make these files don't visit torrent sites.
And if you want to play the big 1080p files you'd better get a real media player. Know the limits of your gear.

@nargyriadis 
try an older version of mkvmerge! 4.0.0 should work!
Make sure you set compression to "none" in extra options.
...that didnt work for me for some reason!
